title: New game mode - Dodge Ball (created by Mrlazydude and Peppa
body:
Rules - Blue team cant go out of the fountain and red team cant go passed the nexus tower (left or right) 2. champs allowed - Any champ that can pull for blue team, red team - any champ that is ranged.

Goals 4 BLUE - pull red to the fountain ( pull them 5 times to win and must get the kill to)
Goals 4 RED - Hit blue team with a "RANGED ATTACK " (need to hit 5 times to win).

GL,HF SUMMONERS QUESTIONS PLZ ASK!!!

replies.body: There are only 3 'pull' champions. The mode is too restrictive and too quick.
This game mode would suck and I'm thankful that it will never go live.
Plus do any map. Suggested The Crystal Scar
